trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for creating new Web site user accounts.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于创建新网站用户帐户的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Creating a User](#creating_a_user) - [Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [Validation Grouping](#validation_grouping) - [Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction The CreateUserWizard control provides the user interface for the object that communicates with your Web site's user data store to create new user accounts in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#Introduction) - [创建用户](#creating_a_user) - [样式和模板](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组](#validation_grouping) - [格式使用的布局模板](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [可访问性](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 介绍通过提供的用户界面与网站的用户数据存储在数据存储区中创建新用户帐户进行通信的对象。

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizard relies on the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> to create the user and disable them if necessary.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserWizard 依赖于<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>若要创建用户并禁用它们，如有必要。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are not familiar with ASP.NET login controls, you might find it helpful to read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 登录控件，你可能会发现它有助于读取[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)才能继续。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: By default, the CreateUserWizard control will accept a user name and password from the Web site visitor.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，通过将接受的用户名和密码从网站访问者。

trans-unit.source: Based on the requirements of the site's <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object, the CreateUserWizard control will optionally accept an e-mail address, represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> property, and a password recovery confirmation question and answer, represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 基于站点的<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>对象，控件将根据需要接受电子邮件地址，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>属性，以及密码恢复确认问题和答案，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> CreateUserWizard</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>的要求

trans-unit.source: For a table showing all required and optional controls for CreateUserWizard, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 CreateUserWizard 显示所有必选和可选的控件的表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property is set in the application's Web.config file, you could potentially generate a password that does not pass the regular expression strength test.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>应用程序的 Web.config 文件中设置属性，则可能无法生成器不传递正则表达式强度测试。 密码</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, creating a user raises an error that indicates an invalid password.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，创建用户时引发错误，该值指示某个无效的密码。

trans-unit.source: ## Creating a User When a user is created with the CreateUserWizard, the control interacts with the current to accomplish the following tasks in order.
trans-unit.target: # # 创建用户时用户与 CreateUserWizard 创建，该控件交互与当前完成以下任务顺序。

trans-unit.source: Create a password if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建的密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create the user in the data store that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> represents.
trans-unit.target: 在数据存储区中创建用户<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>表示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Disable the user in the store if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> property is set to `true.` You can extend the CreateUserWizard control to accept additional information by adding additional fields, or by adding additional steps before or after the provided templates in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用存储区中的用户<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>属性设置为`true.`可以扩展通过接受其他信息，通过添加其他字段，或添加其他步骤之前或之后在提供的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> step is the first step within the CreateUserWizard control, and is a required step.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>步骤是通过中的第一步，是必需的步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>属性设置为`false`以防止用户返回到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>步骤并意外尝试使用的相同凭据创建另一个用户帐户。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> property is not maintained in view state and you must include logic in your application to maintain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>设置为`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>属性不会保留在视图状态并必须将逻辑包括在应用程序保持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: CreateUserWizard control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 表示文本框中，如 CreateUserWizard 控件属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event raised by the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>由文本框中引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizard control can optionally send e-mail messages to new users if you have configured an SMTP mail server to send e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 如果配置了 SMTP 邮件服务器发送电子邮件，通过根据需要可以向新用户发送电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The CreateUserWizard control uses Internet e-mail services to send login information to users.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 通过使用 Internet 电子邮件服务向用户发送登录信息。

trans-unit.source: There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 有电子邮件中发送密码的固有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 你应该确定是否可以接受你的站点的这些安全风险。

trans-unit.source: ## Styles and Templates When the CreateUserWizard control is not customized with templates, the property of the CreateUserWizard control applies to the first text box in the control and the property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control.
trans-unit.target: # # 样式模板时通过不使用模板，自定义和属性通过适用于控件中的第一个文本框和属性，应用于控件的所有文本框。

trans-unit.source: If the CreateUserWizard control is customized with templates, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过自定义模板，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, directly set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of each template child control.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，直接设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>的每个模板子控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: CreateUserWizard control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 表示文本框中，如 CreateUserWizard 控件属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event raised by the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>由文本框中引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property recreates the child controls of the CreateUserWizard control, and their control state is lost in the process.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>属性重新创建通过，子控件，并在过程中丢失其控件状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the CreateUserWizard control's child controls, or avoid putting controls inside of templates.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免这种情况下，显式维护通过的子控件的控件状态，或避免使模板内部的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the CreateUserWizard control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的 CreateUserWizard 控件样式属性并说明每个样式属性会影响哪些用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关哪些属性的每个样式应用到的列表，请参阅的单个样式属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: |Style property|UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||**Continue** button.| ||**Create User** button.| ||Links to other pages.| ||Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||Text entry input fields.| ||Title text for each view.| ||Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.| ||Error messages when the membership provider fails to create a new user account.| ||The text that describes password requirements.| ||Error messages associated with validation.| ## Validation Grouping The CreateUserWizard control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the CreateUserWizard control can be validated separately.
trans-unit.target: |样式属性 |受影响的用户界面元素 | |--------------------|-------------------------| ||**继续**按钮。 | ||**Create User**按钮。 | ||链接至其他页面。 | ||告知用户如何使用控件的页面上的说明文本。 | ||标签的所有输入字段，例如文本框。 | ||文本输入输入字段。 | ||标题为每个视图的文本。 | ||当密码恢复或重置尝试时成功向用户显示的文本。 | ||错误消息，当成员资格提供程序无法创建新的用户帐户时。 | ||描述密码要求的文本。 | ||与验证相关联的错误消息。 | # # 验证分组通过使用验证组，以便其他字段在同一页上为通过单独已验证。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the CreateUserWizard control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>通过属性用作验证组的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a CreateUserWizard control with the ID "CreateUserWizard1" will use a validation group name of "CreateUserWizard1".
trans-unit.target: 例如，通过使用 ID"CreateUserWizard1"将使用"CreateUserWizard1"的验证组名称。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the validation group that the CreateUserWizard control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要设置的验证组中通过是的一部分，你必须将控件模板和更改的验证组名称。

trans-unit.source: Note that the CreateUserWizard class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> class, which does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，CreateUserWizard 类继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>类，不支持特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈现为非标准或 quirks 模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizard does not attempt to optimize rendering for non-standard Internet Explorer mode.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserWizard 不会尝试优化呈现为非标准的 Internet 资源管理器模式。

trans-unit.source: To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the CreateUserWizard control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取使用通过最佳 Internet 资源管理器中呈现，请使用 XHTML 文档类型，默认情况下，在 Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中添加。

trans-unit.source: ## Formatting Using Layout Templates The CreateUserWizard control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element.
trans-unit.target: # # 格式使用布局模板 CreateUserWizard 控制可用于指定的控件布局，而无需使用 HTML`table`元素。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以使用`LayoutTemplate`元素以指定的布局。

trans-unit.source: In the layout template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control.
trans-unit.target: 在布局模板中，你创建占位符控件以指示应在控件中动态插入项的位置。

trans-unit.source: (This is similar to how the template model for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control works.) For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: (这是类似于如何模板模型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件的工作原理。)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记辅助功能的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the step that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前向用户显示的步骤。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStepIndex property provides the zero-based index of the step that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: ActiveStepIndex 属性提供的步骤中当前显示的从零开始的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically set the ActiveStepIndex property to dynamically display a step to the user.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式 ActiveStepIndex 将属性设置为动态向用户显示一个步骤。

trans-unit.source: The index of the step that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 当前向用户显示的步骤索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最终用户的密码恢复确认提示问题答案。

trans-unit.source: The membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property will determine whether the question and answer text boxes are displayed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性将确定是否在运行时显示的问题和答案的文本框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an answer is required by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property, then the answer text box will appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的成员资格提供程序需要的答案<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性，则应答文本框中将出现在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>与其关联的对象</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>上显示每个文本框中

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to automatically generate a password for the new user account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示自动生成新的用户帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: The AutoGeneratePassword property makes it possible to create user accounts without entering a password for them.
trans-unit.target: AutoGeneratePassword 属性使可以创建用户帐户，而无需为其输入密码。

trans-unit.source: For example, this functionality is useful when an administrator creates a new user's account and then gives a password to the user.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此功能非常有用，当管理员创建新用户的帐户，然后向用户提供密码。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You cannot create users using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> if AutoGeneratePassword is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property is set in the application's Web.config.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 无法创建用户使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>如果 AutoGeneratePassword 设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>在应用程序的 Web.config 中设置属性。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: An error message indicating an invalid password will result.
trans-unit.target: 将导致错误消息，指明密码无效。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically generate a password for the new user account; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要自动生成新的用户帐户; 的密码否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the CompleteSuccessText property to change the message that is displayed when a user account is successfully created.
trans-unit.target: CompleteSuccessText 属性用于更改已成功创建用户帐户时，将显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.

trans-unit.source: The text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: 显示的网站用户帐户创建成功后的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your account has been successfully created."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"你的帐户已成功创建。"

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义的网站用户帐户创建成功后所显示的文本外观的属性集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: The CompleteSuccessTextStyle defines the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: CompleteSuccessTextStyle 定义时将创建一个网站用户帐户已成功在显示的文本的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `CompleteSuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `CompleteSuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CompleteSuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CompleteSuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The CompleteSuccessTextStyle property defines the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully, after the user has clicked the **Continue** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> step.
trans-unit.target: CompleteSuccessTextStyle 属性定义的网站用户帐户创建成功之后用户单击, 时显示的文本的外观**继续**按钮上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the CompleteSuccessTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 CompleteSuccessTextStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the CompleteSuccessTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 应用 CompleteSuccessTextStyle 属性中的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by CompleteSuccessTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the CompleteSuccessTextStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性被 CompleteSuccessTextStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，CompleteSuccessTextStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>包含定义显示的网站用户帐户创建成功后的文本的外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the **Continue** button in the final user account creation step.

trans-unit.source: Use the ContinueButtonClick event to provide additional processing when the **Continue** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ContinueButtonClick 事件来提供其他处理时**继续**单击按钮。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName*> value of the **Continue** button on the final step for creating a user account.
trans-unit.target: 表示<> *1> 值**继续** 上用于创建用户帐户的最后一步按钮。

trans-unit.source: The ContinueButtonCommandName field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: ContinueButtonCommandName 字段是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The ContinueButtonCommandName field represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> value of the **Continue** button on the final step for creating a user account.
trans-unit.target: ContinueButtonCommandName 字段表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>值**继续**上用于创建用户帐户的最后一步按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To assign continue functionality to any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of the button to the string that is contained in the ContinueButtonCommandName field.
trans-unit.target: 为将继续到任何功能指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>中包含的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制、 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>ContinueButtonCommandName 字段中包含的字符串的按钮属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The **Continue** button appears on the template for the final step for creating a user account, which is represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **继续**按钮是否显示在用于创建用户帐户，表示的最后一步的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the **Continue** button redirects the user to the URL that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `ContinueButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `ContinueButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ContinueButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ContinueButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A> property, the ContinueButtonText property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image, or as the text of a link.

trans-unit.target: 默认值为"继续"。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置呈现为的按钮类型**继续**按钮。

trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.target: 指定的按钮类型不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page that the user will see after clicking the **Continue** button on the success page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在用户单击后将看到的页面的 URL**继续**成功页上的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The ContinueDestinationPageUrl property contains the URL of the Web page that the user will see after successfully completing registration on your site.
trans-unit.target: ContinueDestinationPageUrl 属性包含的用户将看到已成功完成您的网站上的注册后的网页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: By setting the ContinueDestinationPageUrl property, you can control the first page that newly registered users see.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置 ContinueDestinationPageUrl 属性，可以控制新注册的用户看到的第一页。

trans-unit.source: When the ContinueDestinationPageUrl property is <xref:System.String> and the user clicks the **Continue** button, the page is refreshed and any values on the form are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 当 ContinueDestinationPageUrl 属性是<xref:System.String>和用户单击**继续**按钮，刷新页面，而且该窗体上的任何值将被清除。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the destination page.
trans-unit.target: 目标页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify this control to create any child controls that it contains in preparation for posting back or rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 页框架调用以通知此控制选项可创建任何子控件，它包含在准备回发或呈现。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the membership provider has created the new Web site user account.
trans-unit.target: 成员资格提供程序具有创建新网站用户帐户后发生。

trans-unit.source: The CreatedUser event is raised after the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property creates the new Web site user account.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的成员资格提供程序后引发 CreatedUser 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性创建新网站用户帐户。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property is `true`, the user is logged on to the Web site after the CreatedUser event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>属性是`true`，用户登录到网站 CreatedUser 事件之后。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the CreatedUser event to set Web site values, such as personalization values, before the user is logged on to the site for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CreatedUser 事件之前用户登录到站点首次设置网站的值，如个性化设置值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the membership provider cannot create the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: 当成员资格提供程序无法创建指定的用户帐户时出现。

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserError event is raised on the server when the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property fails to create the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: 在中指定的成员资格提供程序时 CreateUserError 事件服务器上引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性无法创建指定的用户帐户。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error handler is passed a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> object that contains the details of the failure from the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 错误处理程序传递<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>包含成员资格提供程序中的失败的详细信息的对象。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the possible error conditions, see <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可能的错误条件的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the template for the user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户帐户创建步骤对模板的引用。

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserStep property defines the account creation step of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserStep 属性定义的帐户的创建步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> object that CreateUserStep returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>CreateUserStep 返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls that are supported when using templated content for the CreateUserStep.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出用于 CreateUserStep 模板化的内容时，支持的必选和可选控件。

trans-unit.source: |ID or command name|Control type|Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.|Required| |`Password`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.|Required if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> is set to `false`.| |`Email`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.|Required if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> is `true.`| |`ConfirmPassword`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.|No requirements| |`Question`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.|Optional unless required by membership.| |`Answer`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.|Optional unless required by membership.| |`ErrorMessage`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>.|Optional| |`CreateUser`|Any control that causes event bubbling|Optional| |`Cancel`|Any|Optional| If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is required; the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control throws an exception if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is not found or is of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: | ID 或命令名称 |控件类型 |必需/可选 | |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，任何控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。 |所需 | |`Password`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，任何控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。 |所需<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>如果设置为`false`。 | |`Email`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，任何控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。 |当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>时才需要`true.`| |`ConfirmPassword`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，任何控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。 |没有要求 | |`Question`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，任何控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。 |除非所需的成员身份，否则可选。 | |`Answer`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，任何控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。 |除非所需的成员身份，否则可选。 | |`ErrorMessage`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>任何控件。 |可选 | |`CreateUser`|导致事件冒泡任何控件 |可选 | |`Cancel`|任何 |可选 | 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>属性设置为`true`且正在使用模板化的内容，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>控件是必需的;<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件将引发异常，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>控件找不到或属于错误的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>设置为`false`，在引发任何异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>未找到控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control is of the wrong type, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果错误类型的控件，则忽略它。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a membership provider requires a question and answer (determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A> property), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> controls are required and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> throws an exception if they are not found or are of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果成员资格提供程序需要问题和答案 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A>属性)，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>控件为必选和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>它们找不到或属于错误的类型时引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: If they are not required by the membership provider, no exception is thrown if they are not found, and if they are of the wrong type they are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序不需要它们，如果未找到，并且如果它们的类型不正确它们将被忽略，是不引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"></xref> value that represents the user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"> </xref>值，该值表示用户帐户创建步骤。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the membership provider is called to create the new Web site user account.
trans-unit.target: 成员资格提供程序调用创建新网站用户帐户之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The CreatingUser event is raised prior to calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method on the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 创建用户事件引发之前调用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法中指定的成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the CreatingUser event to establish defaults or modify the information entered by the user before passing the information to the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用创建用户事件建立的默认值或修改然后再将信息传递到成员资格提供程序由用户输入的信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the new user should be allowed to log on to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应允许新用户登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: The DisableCreatedUser property determines if the newly created user account will be marked as disabled in the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: DisableCreatedUser 属性确定如果新创建的用户帐户将标记为禁用在成员资格数据存储中。

trans-unit.source: When user accounts are marked as disabled, the accounts are not allowed to log on to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 当用户帐户被标记为禁用时，不允许帐户登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your Web site allows new users to request an account, but requires administrative approval before allowing access, set the DisableCreatedUser property to `true` to disable newly created accounts until an administrator approves the account.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的网站允许新用户请求一个帐户，但需要管理批准在允许访问前的，将 DisableCreatedUser 属性设置为`true`来禁用新创建的帐户，直到管理员批准该帐户。

trans-unit.source: When DisableCreatedUser is `true`, you should set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property to `false` so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> does not attempt to log on the new user.
trans-unit.target: DisableCreatedUser 时`true`，应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>属性`false`以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>不会尝试登录到新的用户。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new user is allowed to log on to the Web site; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果允许新用户登录到网站;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>与其关联的对象</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>上显示每个文本框中

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the label for the e-mail text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的电子邮件文本框中的标签的文本。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The label text that identifies the e-mail text box.
trans-unit.target: 标识电子邮件文本框中的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "E-mail:".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"电子邮件:"。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来验证提供的电子邮件地址的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Use the EmailRegularExpression property to specify a regular expression that validates the e-mail address entered by the user to confirm that it matches a specific pattern.
trans-unit.target: EmailRegularExpression 属性用于指定验证要确认它与匹配特定模式的用户输入的电子邮件地址的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: A common use is to make sure that the user has entered a complete e-mail address, such as **user@contoso.com**.
trans-unit.target: 常见用途是确保用户具有输入一个完整的电子邮件地址，如** user@contoso.com **。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the e-mail address by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式使用除置于上的电子邮件地址中指定的成员资格提供程序的任何限制外<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider rejects the e-mail address for any reason, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序由于任何原因拒绝电子邮件地址中, 所包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A>属性显示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The address is only compared to the regular expression if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅与正则表达式相比地址<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the e-mail address does not pass the regular expression, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 中的电子邮件地址未通过正则表达式，如果包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the regular expression used to validate an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于验证电子邮件地址的正则表达式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed when the entered e-mail address does not pass the site's criteria for e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置输入的电子邮件地址未通过电子邮件地址的站点的条件时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Use the EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage property to inform the user that the e-mail address entered did not pass the site's criteria for e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: 使用要通知的电子邮件地址输入的用户的 EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage 属性未通过电子邮件地址的站点的条件。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the entered e-mail address does not pass the regular expression defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression*> property.
trans-unit.target: 输入的电子邮件地址未通过中定义的正则表达式时显示的错误消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression*>

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a different e-mail address."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"请输入其他电子邮件地址。"

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message shown to the user when an e-mail address is not entered in the e-mail text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的电子邮件地址未在电子邮件文本框中输入向用户显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The error message shown to the user when an e-mail address is not entered in the e-mail text box.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件地址未在电子邮件文本框中输入向用户显示错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "E-mail is required."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"必需 ' 电子邮件"。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of style properties that define the appearance of error messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取对定义的错误消息的外观的样式属性的集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: Use the ErrorMessageStyle property to change the appearance of error messages that are displayed when the membership provider fails to create a new user account.
trans-unit.target: ErrorMessageStyle 属性用于更改成员资格提供程序无法创建新的用户帐户时，将显示的错误消息的外观。

trans-unit.source: By default, the ErrorMessageStyle is set to display the following messages in red: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateEmailErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateUserNameErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidQuestionErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UnknownErrorMessage%2A> The ErrorMessageStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ErrorMessageStyle 设置为以红色显示以下消息:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateEmailErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateUserNameErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidQuestionErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UnknownErrorMessage%2A>ErrorMessageStyle 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UnknownErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidQuestionErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateUserNameErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateEmailErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the ErrorMessageStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 ErrorMessageStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings that are applied in the ErrorMessageStyle property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: ErrorMessageStyle 属性中应用任何设置替代的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by ErrorMessageStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the ErrorMessageStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性被 ErrorMessageStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，ErrorMessageStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> containing the style properties that define the appearance of error messages on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>包含在控件定义的错误消息的外观的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The text caption for the link to the Help page.
trans-unit.target: 指向帮助页的文本标题。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of properties that define the appearance of hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置定义超链接的外观的属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The HyperLinkStyle property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that you use to change the appearance of hyperlinks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: HyperLinkStyle 属性获取的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象用于更改中的超链接的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The HyperLinkStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: HyperLinkStyle 属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the HyperLinkStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 HyperLinkStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the HyperLinkStyle property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 应用 HyperLinkStyle 属性中的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by HyperLinkStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the HyperLinkStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性被 HyperLinkStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，HyperLinkStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>包含定义超链接的外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets instructions for creating a new user account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于创建新的用户帐户的说明。

trans-unit.source: The InstructionText property contains instructions for users creating a new user account.
trans-unit.target: InstructionText 属性包含对用户创建新的用户帐户的说明。

trans-unit.source: This text is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, following the title.
trans-unit.target: 此文本显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，在标题后。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: If the InstructionText property is set to an empty string (""), no instruction text is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果 InstructionText 属性设置为一个空字符串 ("")，向用户显示任何说明文本。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: The InstructionTextStyle property defines the appearance of instruction text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: InstructionTextStyle 属性定义中的说明文本的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `InstructionTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `InstructionTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `InstructionTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by InstructionTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the InstructionTextStyle property has no effect.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的密码取回答案无效时显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property can support a question and answer for retrieving or resetting the user's password.

trans-unit.source: The actual requirements for the answer are determined by the membership provider, and might be different for different providers.
trans-unit.target: 答案的实际要求由成员资格提供程序，因此对于不同的提供程序可能会不同。

trans-unit.source: The LabelStyle property defines the appearance of labels in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: LabelStyle 属性定义中的标签的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `LabelStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `LabelStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LabelStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `LabelStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.target: LabelStyle 属性定义以下属性的外观:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerLabelText%2A>LabelStyle 属性的样式设置的样式设置与合并<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailLabelText%2A>

trans-unit.target: 应用 LabelStyle 属性中的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by LabelStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the LabelStyle property has no effect.
