trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the SaveViewState method.
trans-unit.target: 从已保存 SaveViewState 方法的一个页面请求还原视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要还原的控件状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: savedState is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: savedState不是有效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to log in the new user after creating the user account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在新的用户登录后创建的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The LoginCreatedUser property can be set to `false` if you want to create a user account but not authenticate the account after it is created.
trans-unit.target: LoginCreatedUser 属性可以设置为`false`如果你想要创建用户帐户身份验证，但该帐户将在创建后。

trans-unit.source: This might be useful if you are an administrator creating user accounts, for example, or if there is a waiting period before users can access the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是管理员创建用户帐户，例如，或如果没有用户可以访问 Web 站点之前的等待期，这可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the LoginCreatedUser property is set to `true`, the user will be created and logged in at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> step.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时 LoginCreatedUser 属性设置为`true`，将创建用户，并且将其登录的末尾<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the user to be logged in after all the steps have been completed, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> property to `false` until all of the steps of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control are completed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想让用户登录完成所有步骤后，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>属性`false`直至将所有的步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件都已都完成。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new user should be logged in after creating the user account; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果新的用户应创建的用户帐户; 后登录否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of the e-mail message sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义的电子邮件发送给新用户的特征的属性集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: The MailDefinition property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the e-mail message that is sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: MailDefinition 属性返回一组用于定义的格式的属性和内容发送给新用户的电子邮件消息的引用。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括的主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关属性的完整列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: The MailDefinition property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: MailDefinition 属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: You can set the MailDefinition properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置 MailDefinition 属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类 (例如， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.SubProperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.SubProperty`(例如， `MailDefinition.Subject`)。

trans-unit.source: An e-mail message is sent to new users only if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> is not `null` and if <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A> is not empty or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件发送到新的用户才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>不`null`如果<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A>不为空或`null`。</xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail> event is raised and an attempt is made to send the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail>引发事件并尝试发送电子邮件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A> property must be set to an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A>属性必须设置为电子邮件地址。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Web.HttpException>引发异常。</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: When the e-mail message is created from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object, it will make the substitutions listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 当从创建电子邮件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象，它将使以下表中列出的替换。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: |Substitution text|Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |`<%UserName%>`|The user name of the newly created user account.| |`<%Password%>`|The password for the newly created user account.| If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient.
trans-unit.target: |替换文本 |替换为 | |-----------------------|-------------------| |`<%UserName%>`|新创建的用户帐户的用户名。 | |`<%Password%>`|新创建的用户帐户的密码。 | 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象是`true`，对电子邮件的内容将 HTML 编码，以防止跨站点脚本的安全漏洞，为消息接收方。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A> method to modify the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>方法可以修改<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不能保证用户将接收或查看电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: To verify that a user has received a notification by e-mail, consider providing a confirmation link in the e-mail message that enables the user to confirm that the notification was received.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证的用户已通过电子邮件中收到通知，请考虑提供使用户能够确认通知已收到电子邮件消息中的确认链接。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"></xref> object that defines the e-mail message sent to a new user.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"></xref>对象，用于定义电子邮件发送给新用户。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From*> is not set to an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From*>未设置为电子邮件地址。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider called to create user accounts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置调用以创建用户帐户的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The MembershipProvider property contains the name of the defined <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> class membership provider that is used to store the user information.
trans-unit.target: MembershipProvider 属性包含的名称定义<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>用于存储用户信息的类成员资格提供程序。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: You can store membership information for users in different data stores by changing the value of the MembershipProvider property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过更改 MembershipProvider 属性的值在不同的数据存储区中存储用户成员资格的信息。

trans-unit.source: When the MembershipProvider property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>, the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file is used.
trans-unit.target: 当 MembershipProvider 属性设置为<xref:System.String.Empty>，使用 Web.config 文件中定义的默认成员资格提供程序。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Membership providers are defined in the Web.config file in the `<membership>` section.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web.config 文件中定义成员资格提供程序`<membership>`部分。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> used to create user accounts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>用于创建用户帐户。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String.Empty>。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The specified membership provider is not defined in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 指定的成员资格提供程序未在 Web.config 文件中定义。

trans-unit.target: 确定是否沿页的 UI 服务器控件层次结构向上传递服务器控件的事件。

trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The OnCreatedUser method is called after the Web site user account is created by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 成员资格提供程序创建的网站用户帐户后调用 OnCreatedUser 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property is `true`, the user is logged in after the OnCreatedUser method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>属性是`true`，调用 OnCreatedUser 方法后，用户已登录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnCreatedUser method to set Web site values, such as personalization properties, before the user is logged in for the first time.
trans-unit.target: OnCreatedUser 方法用于设置网站的值，例如个性化属性之前，用户第一次登录。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser"></xref> event prior to calling the membership provider to create the new user account.

trans-unit.source: Use the OnCreatingUser method to do any processing required before sending the new user information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method of the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 OnCreatingUser 方法来执行前发送到的新用户信息所需的任何处理<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法中指定的成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the user name field to all lowercase letters, or compare the e-mail address to a list of restricted addresses before allowing creation of the user account.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能会将用户名字段设置为所有小写字母，或在允许的用户帐户创建之前比较列表的受限制的地址的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: The OnSendMailError method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send e-mail to the new user.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 邮件系统引发尝试向新用户发送电子邮件时出现异常时调用 OnSendMailError 方法。

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象作为传递`e`参数，以确定异常的实际原因。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most common problem is a configuration error in the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的问题是存在配置错误`<smtpMail>`Web.config 文件的部分。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to signal that the exception that caused the OnSendMailError method to be called has been taken care of, otherwise the exception is re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象作为传递`e`参数发出信号，导致 OnSendMailError 方法调用的异常已被处理的否则例外情况是重新引发。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnSendMailError method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSendMailError 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs"></xref> containing the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户输入的密码。

trans-unit.source: The Password property contains the password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 密码属性包含用户输入的密码。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator> object is provided for the Password and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> text box values.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>对象提供的密码和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A>文本框值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件还具有<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator>与其关联的对象</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>上显示每个文本框中

trans-unit.source: The password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 由用户输入的密码。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义的描述密码要求的文本外观的属性集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: The PasswordHintStyle property defines the appearance of the text that describes password requirements in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: PasswordHintStyle 属性定义的描述中的密码要求的文本的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The PasswordHintStyle property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: PasswordHintStyle 属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the PasswordHintStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 PasswordHintStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the PasswordHintStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 应用 PasswordHintStyle 属性中的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by PasswordHintStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the PasswordHintStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性被 PasswordHintStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，PasswordHintStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of the text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>包含定义的描述密码要求的文本外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置描述密码要求的文本。

trans-unit.source: You can use the PasswordHintText property to provide guidelines and requirements for the user on how to create a password.
trans-unit.target: PasswordHintText 属性可用于提供有关如何创建密码的指导原则和用户的要求。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could set the PasswordHintText property to "Your password must be at least six characters long."
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以设置将 PasswordHintText 属性设为"你的密码必须至少为六个字符。"

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to validate that the user entered a password that conforms to the guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性可以验证用户输入的密码是否符合这些准则。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 描述密码要求的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the label for the password text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密码文本框中的标签的文本。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text of the label for the password text box.
trans-unit.target: 密码文本框中的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Password:".
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"密码:"。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided password.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来验证提供的密码的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Use the PasswordRegularExpression property to define the requirements for passwords used to validate users on your Web site.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PasswordRegularExpression 属性来定义用于验证您的网站上的用户的密码要求。

trans-unit.source: A common use is to make sure that a user has included symbols other than letters in a password to make it harder for attackers to guess a password.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见用途是确保用户具有密码以使其猜出密码的攻击者更难中包含非字母符号。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the password by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 上的密码任何约束中指定的成员资格提供程序之外，还使用正则表达式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider rejects the password for any reason, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序拒绝密码出于任何原因中, 所包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A>属性显示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the password entered does not pass the regular expression, the error message contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的密码未通过正则表达式，错误消息包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the regular expression used to validate the provided password.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于验证提供的密码的正则表达式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message shown when the password entered does not conform to the site's password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置输入的密码不符合该站点的密码要求时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Use the PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage property to inform the user that the password entered did not conform to the site's password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage 属性以通知用户输入的密码不符合该站点的密码要求。

trans-unit.source: The error message shown when the password entered does not pass the regular expression defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression*> property.
trans-unit.target: 显示输入的密码未通过正则表达式中定义的错误消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression*>

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a different password."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"请输入一个不同的密码。"

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the error message shown when the user does not enter a password.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示在用户未输入密码时的错误消息的文本。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The error message shown when the user does not enter a password.
trans-unit.target: 显示用户未输入密码的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Password is required."
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"密码是必需的。"

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由用户输入的密码恢复确认问题。

trans-unit.source: The membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property will determine whether the Question and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> text boxes are displayed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性将确定是否问题和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>文本框显示在运行时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>与其关联。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>每个文本框中

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: The password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的密码恢复确认问题。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user is required to enter a password confirmation question and answer.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否要求用户输入密码确认问题和答案。

trans-unit.source: The QuestionAndAnswerRequired property returns a value from the membership provider set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property specifying whether the user is required to enter a password confirmation question and answer.
trans-unit.target: QuestionAndAnswerRequired 属性从设置的成员资格提供程序返回一个值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性指定是否要求用户输入密码确认问题和答案。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a Membership provider requires a question and answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> controls are required and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> throws an exception if they are not found or of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序需要问题和答案，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>控件为必选和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>引发异常，如果未找到或错误的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>

trans-unit.source: If they are not required by the Membership provider, no exception is thrown if they are not found, and if they are of the wrong type they are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序不需要它们，如果未找到，并且如果它们的类型不正确它们将被忽略，是不引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is required to enter a password confirmation question and answer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户需要输入密码确认提示问题和答案;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置问题文本框的标签的文本。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The error message that is displayed when the user does not enter a password confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 用户未输入密码确认问题时，将显示错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Security question is required."
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"安全问题是必需的。"

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an e-mail address is required for the Web site user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否需要为网站用户的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: When the RequireEmail property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> will display a text box and an associated label for the user to enter an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 当 RequireEmail 属性是`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>将显示一个文本框和一个关联的标签的用户输入的电子邮件地址。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: If the user does not enter an e-mail address, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property will display an error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户未输入电子邮件地址，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>属性将显示一条错误消息。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the RequireEmail property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is required and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> throws an exception if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is not found or is of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RequireEmail 属性设置为`true`且正在使用模板化的内容，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>需要进行控制和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>时引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>控件找不到或属于错误的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>

trans-unit.source: If RequireEmail is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RequireEmail 设置为`false`，在引发任何异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>找不到。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it is of the wrong type, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是错误的类型，则忽略它。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property requires a unique e-mail address for new users, you must set the RequireEmail property to `true` so that the UI for entering an e-mail address is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果成员资格提供程序中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性需要新用户的唯一的电子邮件地址，必须将 RequireEmail 属性设置为`true`以便显示用于输入电子邮件地址的用户界面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the user will see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A> but have no way to enter an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 否则，用户将看到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>但没有任何办法输入电子邮件地址。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an e-mail address is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果的电子邮件地址是必需的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 将保存已修改后的任何状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件; 的当前视图状态的对象否则为如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the user is sent an e-mail confirmation that an account has been created.
trans-unit.target: 向用户发送电子邮件，确认已创建帐户之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> class will send an e-mail message confirming that a new Web site account has been created when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property defines an e-mail message to send.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>类将发送电子邮件确认，新网站创建帐户时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>属性定义电子邮件发送。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Because the e-mail message only has automatic replacement fields for the user name and password fields, you can use the SendingMail event to modify the e-mail message before it is sent to the new user.
trans-unit.target: 由于电子邮件消息仅具有自动替换字段用于用户名和密码字段，你可以使用 SendingMail 事件发送到新的用户之前修改电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is an SMTP error sending e-mail to the new user.
trans-unit.target: 当向新用户发送电子邮件的 SMTP 错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: The SendMailError event is raised when there is a problem using the SMTP mail provider to send e-mail to the e-mail address provided by the new user.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SMTP 邮件提供商向新用户提供的电子邮件地址发送电子邮件问题时引发 SendMailError 事件。

trans-unit.source: The most common reason to raise this event is when the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件的最常见原因是当`<smtpMail>`Web.config 文件的部分不正确。

trans-unit.source: The default SendMailError event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the e-mail system.
trans-unit.target: 默认 SendMailError 事件处理程序不会捕捉或处理电子邮件系统中的 SMTP 错误。

trans-unit.source: Your SendMailError event handler must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object to `true` in order to stop the error from appearing to the Web site user.
trans-unit.target: SendMailError 事件处理程序必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象传递给`true`若要停止中显示给网站用户的错误。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Sets design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: 设置控件的设计时数据。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含控件的设计时数据。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text that notifies screen readers to skip the sidebar area's content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于呈现通知屏幕阅读器跳过侧栏区域的内容的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: Use the SkipLinkText property to specify the alternate text for a hidden-image read by screen readers that will provide the ability to skip the sidebar area's content.
trans-unit.target: SkipLinkText 属性用于指定隐藏图像将提供跳过侧栏区域的内容的功能的屏幕读取器所读取的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的文本提供了可用于使控件更易于访问的隐藏图像的说明的辅助技术设备。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> property is set to `false` (the default), the SkipLinkText property does not create a hidden image with alternate text.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>属性设置为`false`（默认值）、 SkipLinkText 属性不会创建的隐藏的图像的替换文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SkipLinkText property works only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: SkipLinkText 属性时才起作用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> renders as alternate text with an invisible image, as a hint to screen readers.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref>将呈现为不可见的图像的替换文字，作为对屏幕阅读器的提示。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of text box controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义文本框控件的外观的属性集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: The TextBoxStyle property defines the appearance of text box controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: TextBoxStyle 属性定义中的文本框控件的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The TextBoxStyle property defines the appearance of the following text box controls: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> text box field - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> text box field - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> text box field - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> text box field - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> text box field The style settings for the TextBoxStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: TextBoxStyle 属性定义的以下文本的控件的外观:-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>文本框字段-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>文本框字段-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A>文本框字段-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>文本框字段- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>TextBoxStyle 属性的样式设置合并的样式设置文本框字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the TextBoxStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 应用 TextBoxStyle 属性中的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by TextBoxStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the TextBoxStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性被 TextBoxStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，TextBoxStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of text box controls.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>包含定义文本框控件的外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of titles.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义的标题的外观的属性集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: The TitleTextStyle property defines the appearance of titles in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: TitleTextStyle 属性定义中的标题的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `TitleTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `TitleTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TitleTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TitleTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The TitleTextStyle property defines the appearance of the title on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> step and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> step.
trans-unit.target: TitleTextStyle 属性上定义的标题的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>步骤和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the TitleTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 TitleTextStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the TitleTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 应用 TitleTextStyle 属性中的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by TitleTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the TitleTextStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性被 TitleTextStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，TitleTextStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of titles.

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point to begin tracking changes to the control as part of the control viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 将标记的起始点开始到控制面板的更改跟踪的控件视图状态的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed when an error returned by the membership provider is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示未定义成员资格提供程序返回的错误时的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when an error returned by the membership provider is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 显示未定义成员资格提供程序返回的错误时的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Your account was not created.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"未创建你的帐户。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 请重试。"

trans-unit.source: The default text of the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由用户输入的用户名。

trans-unit.source: If a user name is required by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property, then the user name text box will appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的成员资格提供程序需要的用户名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性，则用户名称文本框中将出现在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>与其关联的对象</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>上显示每个文本框中

trans-unit.source: The user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 由用户输入的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the label for the user name text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户的名称文本框的标签的文本。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.

trans-unit.source: The text of the label for the user name text box.
trans-unit.target: 用户的名称文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "User Name:".
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"用户名称:"。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed when the user name text box is left blank.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户的名称文本框为空时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the user name text box is left blank.
trans-unit.target: 用户的名称文本框为空时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "User Name is required."
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"用户名称是必需的。"

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the validation error messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>对象，它允许你设置的外观的验证错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidatorTextStyle property to change the appearance of messages that are displayed for input validation errors.
trans-unit.target: ValidatorTextStyle 属性用于更改显示的输入的验证错误的消息的外观。

trans-unit.source: By default, the ValidatorTextStyle is set to display the following messages in red: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> The ValidatorTextStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ValidatorTextStyle 设置为以红色显示以下消息:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>ValidatorTextStyle 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `ValidatorTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `ValidatorTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ValidatorTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ValidatorTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the ValidatorTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 ValidatorTextStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the ValidatorTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 应用 ValidatorTextStyle 属性中的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by ValidatorTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the ValidatorTextStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性被 ValidatorTextStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，ValidatorTextStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> containing the style properties that define the appearance of validation error messages on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>包含在控件定义的验证错误消息的外观的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection containing all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects defined for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含所有的集合的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>为控件定义的对象。

trans-unit.source: The WizardSteps property returns a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: WizardSteps 属性返回的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>组成对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: You can use the WizardSteps collection to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用以编程方式访问 WizardSteps 集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>中所含对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> methods to programmatically manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A>方法以编程方式操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>集合中的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> representing all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects defined for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref>表示所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>对象定义<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref>控件。
